snippet.title: Astro Duel 2 - Dev Intro
snippet.description:
Astro Duel 2 is a sci-fi combat game combining top-down space dog fights with up-close platforming action. Whether versus or co-op, battle through space and on foot at the same time! Strike within the fully-destructible arenas or just nuke ‘em from orbit. Coming March 7, 2024 to Steam, Epic and Nintendo Switch.

Wishlist on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/655350
Wishlist on Epic: https://www.epicgames.com/p/astro-due...
